Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.app.authenticator

Class AuthenticatorHttpServerCompanion

java.lang.Object
fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD
io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.app.authenticator.AuthenticatorHttpServerCompanion
public class AuthenticatorHttpServerCompanion extends fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD
This class creates a web server that will help to fulfill the OAuth authorization process.

As soon as the OAuth 2.0 authorization process has been started with Smint.io a HTTP service is required to listen to the URL that will receive the OAuth 2.0 token through via system browser. Afterwards the token will be written so the IAuthTokenStorage and the HTTP service will be terminated.

This class will create such a HTTP service listening on all interfaces of the current running machine. It serves the static files from inside this jar with path WWW_BASE_RESOURCE_PATH and will hand over all URL parameters on the OAuth redirect URL to the OAuth authorizer (of classISmintIoOAuthAuthorizer). In case the function ISmintIoOAuthAuthorizer.analyzeReceivedAuthorizationData(Map) succeeds, then a redirect to page WWW_SUCCESS_PAGE is sent as response. In all error cases, the error message is sent along an HTTP error code of 500.

Calling page WWW_TERMINATE_PAGE will terminate the web server, so the caller does not need to.

  • Field Details

    • WAIT_AFTER_AUTHORIZER_IS_CALLED_MILLISECONDS

      public static final int WAIT_AFTER_AUTHORIZER_IS_CALLED_MILLISECONDS
      After the received parameters have been passed to the authorizer, a stop() is called after some time.

      After this time of milliseconds have elapsed, a stop() signal is sent to the web server to terminate it. It might terminate earlier, because the URL of the terminate page is called (see WWW_TERMINATE_PAGE). Nevertheless it is good to make the web service stop even if the browser has been closed. 

       WAIT_AFTER_AUTHORIZER_IS_CALLED_MILLISECONDS = 10000
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • WWW_BASE_RESOURCE_PATH

      public static final String WWW_BASE_RESOURCE_PATH
      This is the base path within the class path to load files from, when requested by the browser.

      Files within this resource path can be used to create a good looking response page. 

       WWW_BASE_RESOURCE_PATH = "smint.io-authorizer/www"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • WWW_SUCCESS_PAGE

      public static final String WWW_SUCCESS_PAGE
      The path to a page displaying a success message within WWW_BASE_RESOURCE_PATH. 
       WWW_SUCCESS_PAGE = "/success.html"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • WWW_TERMINATE_PAGE

      public static final String WWW_TERMINATE_PAGE
      An URL path that will terminate this HTTP server, which can be used at the end of the success page. 
       WWW_TERMINATE_PAGE = "/terminate"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthenticatorHttpServerCompanion

      @Inject public AuthenticatorHttpServerCompanion(io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.models.ISettingsModel settings, @Named("authorizer-url-params-consumer") Consumer<Map<String,String[]>> consumerOfOAuthParams)
      Creates a new instance that will use the provided authorizer to drive the authorization.

      The Web server is not yet started. 

       final AuthenticatorHttpServerCompanion webServer = new AuthenticatorHttpServerCompanion(settings, tokenStorage);
 webServer.start(6000, false);
      Parameters:
      settings - the settings to read the port to listen to. ISettingsModel.getOAuthLocalUrlReceivingAccessData() is fetched and its URL.getPort() port will be used.
      consumerOfOAuthParams - a consumer to receive the URL parameters containing all OAuth data - must not be null. if injected by name, the name is set to @Named("authorizer-url-params-consumer").
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - in case any parameter is null.

    • start

      public void start() throws IOException
      Starts up the web server in an extra thread, so this function will only block to check for proper startup.

      As soon as the web server is running, this function will return. There is no way to access the main thread of the web server directly.

      Overrides:
      start in class fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD
      Throws:
      IOException
